author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48718

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_0_X`:
   * This is the PR for the `15_0_X` branch, this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development.
   *  These updates correspond to the **"V1.3"** (last) `GRun` menu for the 2025 pp data-taking period.
  
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets
- [CMSHLT-3534](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3534) [TRK] Configuration improvements related to MkFit
- [CMSHLT-3591](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3591) [EXO] PS changes for AXOL1TL and CICADA (Run2025D)
- [CMSHLT-3596](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3596) [HIN] Unsplit the `IonPhysics` PDs of the PIon menu
- [CMSHLT-3597](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3597) [BRIL] Add `DQMGPUvsCPU` Stream to online LumiScan special Menu
- [CMSHLT-3598](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3598) [ECAL] Add `DQMGPUvsCPU` Stream to online ECAL special Menu
- [CMSHLT-3599](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3599) [TRK] HLT-Tracking updates for 2025 menu: switching off IBC in the pixel generic CPE
- [CMSHLT-3600](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3600) [EGM,Scouting] Scouting doubleEG monitoring path in 2025 pp menu v1.3
- [CMSHLT-3601](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3601) [BRIL] Updates to `LumiScan` menu (post 2025 vdM program)
- [CMSHLT-3606](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3606) [TAU] ETau Monitoring Trigger Fix
- [CMSHLT-3607](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3607) [EXO,Scouting] Adding Calo RecHits to the HLT Scouting Event Content (V1.3)
- [CMSHLT-3608](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3608) [EXO] Pre-scale changes for AXOL1TL when L1 Menu v1_3_0 is deployed
- [CMSHLT-3609](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3609) [MUO] Upper limit on seeds of `hltL3NoFiltersNoVtxTrajSeedIOHit` (slow events)
- [CMSHLT-3610](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3610) [EGM] Update PMS2 EE threshold for Ele WP-Tight triggers
- [CMSHLT-3612](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3612) [EXO] Prescaled Single Muon Shower L1 Seeds Control Path
- [CMSHLT-3615](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3615) [GEM] Add EMTF FEDRAW in RPCMonitor stream
- [CMSHLT-3618](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3618) [DQM,TRK] Improve Tracking at HLT collection coverage in monitoring PDs

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
   * b02848d9892f36cf815e6b6be32b72ac168590ac: update of `FULL`, `GRun` and `Special` L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2025_v1_3_0_xml`
   * 6b481a32dae80d66e019a216dbaf55f13b05569f: update `getEventContent.py` script to provide `HLTriggerMINIAODSIM` event content and update `EventContent_cff` accordingly
   * 0a5ab4b089ce5ccd8939624116263c78d06fd80a: Bumped version of Paths for HLT GRun-2025 V1.3
   * 8ed70200fbfb1cade770a9afe95f915b4ce450d7: remove frozen menu 2025 v1.2 and introduce new frozen menu 2025 v1.3

#### PR validation:

TSG Integration tests

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48718 to CMSSW_15_0_X for 2025 data-taking purposes.

----
**N.B.:** because of the integration of ticket  [CMSHLT-3534](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3534) this update needs to be tested with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48702.
The latter PRs affect only MC-Validation sequences, and they are necessary to integrate the new menu in CMSSW (we would like to see some 15_0_X IBs without problems, after the integration of the new menu, before the menu goes online).
title: HLT menu development for `15_0_X` (9/N)
